Title: Pontifex Zenestra, Matriarch of the Great Wheel
Legend: The Great Wheel turns, and the driving force is faith. As she gives her inspiting battlefield sermons, the raw celestial power of the God-King crackles out from Pontifex Zenestra's sacred palanquin to ininerate her enemies, whilst her acolytes bludgeon and hew any foolish enough to approach her without permision
Intro: Pontifex Zenestra, Matriarch ofthe Great Wheel, is armed with the Sceptre ofthe Wheel.

Rules.Name: Crew
Rules.Rule: CREW: This unit’s Acolytes are armed with a Club and Axe.

Rules.Name: Voice Of The God-King
Rules.Fluff: Zenestra is the mouthpiece of Sigmar himself upon the battlefield; with a simple utterance, she can banish the sorceries ofthe enemy.
Rules.Rule: Voice of the God-King: This unit can attempt to dispel 1 endless spell at the start of your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase, in the same manner as a WIZARD. Add 1 to unbinding rolls made for this unit.

Rules.Name: Blessed Palanquin
Rules.Fluff: The thrice-sanctified sedan chair upon which Zenestra is borne offers her mysticalprotection.
Rules.Rule: This unit has a ward of 4+.

Rules.Name: Wrath Of Azyr
Rules.Fluff: Like the spokes of the Great Wheel, twisting arcs of celestial lightning revolve around Zenestra’s sedan, scorching the enemies of Sigmar until they are naught but smoking husks.
Rules.Rule: Wrath of Azyr:  At the start of the combat phase and after this unit fights, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this unit. On a 2+, the unit being rolled for suffers D3 mortal wounds.
